sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_4f8086aa13c2ba40d80074c66144b01e
sys_update_xml.payload: ch1 { color: #428bca; } #scanForm { & .ng-touched.ng-valid, .ng-dirty.ng-valid { background-color: lightgreen; } & .ng-touched.ng-invalid, .ng-dirty.ng-invalid { background-color: pink; } } .form-group.required .control-label:after { content:"*"; color:red; } span { display: table; margin: 0 auto; } .form-actions { margin: 0; background-color: transparent; text-align: center; }sp_instance{ "data": { "barcode": "" } }truemme-bulk-scanfalseMME Bulk Scantruex_ahho_movable_med.usersfalsesp_widgetamKatulak2017-04-13 19:54:42true4f8086aa13c2ba40d80074c66144b01e594MME Bulk Scan3d8922a01378aa00b38973076144b0bcfalse3d8922a01378aa00b38973076144b0bcsp_widget_4f8086aa13c2ba40d80074c66144b01eamKatulak2017-07-26 13:18:10
